column4: if I need to convert a scanned image into a pdf, what's a good application to handle that...will OpenOffice work?
set up a pdf printer... it's easier in kubuntu
i'm really not sure for gnome... i haven't figured it out... i've done it with KDE...  otherwise, Gimp can make pdfs for the time being

try it :)  mine worked with hpijs package i think
